trans-unit.source: Click Azure Portal > **Mobile Services** > your mobile service > **Dashboard**, and make a note of the **Mobile Service URL** value.
trans-unit.target: Click Azure Portal > **Mobile Services** > your mobile service > **Dashboard**, and make a note of the **Mobile Service URL** value.

trans-unit.source: Register your app with one or more of the following authentication providers:
trans-unit.target: Register your app with one or more of the following authentication providers:

trans-unit.source: Make a note of the client identity and client secret values generated by the provider.
trans-unit.target: Make a note of the client identity and client secret values generated by the provider.

trans-unit.source: Do not distribute or share the client secret.
trans-unit.target: Do not distribute or share the client secret.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, click **Mobile Services** > your mobile service > **Identity** > your identity provider settings, then enter the client ID and secret value from your provider.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, click **Mobile Services** > your mobile service > **Identity** > your identity provider settings, then enter the client ID and secret value from your provider.

trans-unit.source: You've now configured both your app and your mobile service to work with your auth provider.
trans-unit.target: You've now configured both your app and your mobile service to work with your auth provider.

trans-unit.source: You may optionally repeat all these steps for each additional identity provider you'd like to support.
trans-unit.target: You may optionally repeat all these steps for each additional identity provider you'd like to support.
